name: Demon robot runner
description:
While playing "Demon robot runner" you will find lots of fun and great challege as well as a enjoyable experience playing an original indie game.
This game is an endless 2D runner. In this game, you control a robot, and you have to ascend by clicking the mouse and use gravity to descend to avoid all the different obstacles that you find.

What to expect:

-Beautiful and indie graphics.

-Good sound effects.

-Equilibrated challenge in gameplay.

-Different types of obstacles

-Randomly generated levels.

How to play:

-Left mouse click to ascend.
